SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: ADTC01-Alcohol Drinks on a Typical Day
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test-Consumption questions - How many standard drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day?
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: ADTC01-Alcohol Drinks on a Typical Day
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: AUDIT-C - How Many Alcohol Drinks on a Typical Day

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test-Consumption questions - How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: AUDIT-C - How Often Have Alcohol Drink

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: ADTC01-Six or More Drinks One Occasion
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test-Consumption questions - How often do you have six or more drinks on one occasion?
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: ADTC01-Six or More Drinks One Occasion
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: AUDIT-C - How Often Have Six or More Drinks
